description.action: Evan is standing in the corner of the throne room, clutching his blanket tightly and looking nervously at the Koopa Troopers guarding Bowser's throne.
Isaac is huddled next to Evan, trying to make himself as small as possible to avoid drawing the attention of the Koopa Troopers.
Aurelia is clinging to Evan's arm, her eyes wide with fear as she watches the Koopa Troopers closely.
A Koopa Trooper stands guard near the children, his spear in hand and a menacing glare on his face.
Another Koopa Trooper, this one with an eye patch, is also watching the children closely, ready to pounce if they make any sudden moves.
